wybug_title: 韵达快递某系统存在远程命令执行漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-10-21：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-10-26：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 神器发现韵达快递某系统存在远程命令执行漏洞 详细说明：  http://video.yundasys.com:8080/login.action
Whoami: rootWebPath: /opt/avcond/jboss/webapps/ROOTOS.Name: LinuxOS.Version: 2.6.18-128.el5Java.Home: /opt/avcond/javaJava.Version: 1.6.0_26OS.arch: i386User.Name: rootUser.Home: /rootUser.Dir: /Java.Class.Path: :/opt/avcond/jboss/bin/bootstrap.jarJava.IO.Tmpdir: /opt/avcond/jboss/temp
   漏洞证明：  
eth0      Link encap:Ethernet  HWaddr 00:15:17:E6:01:70            inet addr:192.168.1.80  Bcast:192.168.1.255  Mask:255.255.255.0          UP BROADCAST RUNNING MULTICAST  MTU:1500  Metric:1          RX packets:9911503 errors:8 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:4          TX packets:740000 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:1000           RX bytes:1144173278 (1.0 GiB)  TX bytes:316590229 (301.9 MiB)          Base address:0x1000 Memory:81920000-81940000 lo        Link encap:Local Loopback            inet addr:127.0.0.1  Mask:255.0.0.0          UP LOOPBACK RUNNING  MTU:16436  Metric:1          RX packets:11692653 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 frame:0          TX packets:11692653 errors:0 dropped:0 overruns:0 carrier:0          collisions:0 txqueuelen:0           RX bytes:738642004 (704.4 MiB)  TX bytes:738642004 (704.4 MiB)
